meanings.sent1: After using the knife, he needed to resharpening it.

meanings.definition: The act of making something sharp again
meanings.sent1: The resharpening of the scissors made them as good as new.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of resharpening tools from his grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The resharpening of the pencil was a satisfying task for the student.
meanings.sent4: The resharpening of her wit was evident in her quick comebacks.
meanings.sent5: The resharpening of the sword was necessary before the battle.
